sense.name: the outcome of a contest that is a loss
sense.examples: Princeton's defeat at the nationals came as a surprise. It is one of the most famous military defeats in history. The patient's battle with cancer unfortunately ended in defeat.

sense.name: feeling of being thwarted, frustrated in attaining a goal
sense.examples: Mary was put off by John's pervasive sense of defeat. The photo captured the defeat in the faces of the war refugees.
